price: Kuri uwo musi rero, Imana Allah Izobahemba ku vyo bakoze impembo ikwiye vy’ukuri. Aho rero, bazoheza bamenye kandi ko Imana Allah ari Yo Nyakuri[8], Nyenugutomora.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يُوَفِّيهِمُ ٱللَّهُ دِينَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
footnotes: [8] Ukubaho kwayo n’ibikomoka kuri Yo vyose, ni ukuri, nta makenga canke amazinda ari mu mazina n’amatazirano yayo, kibure mu bumana bwayo.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yuwaffīhimu al-lahu dīnahumu al-ḥaqa wayaʿlamūna anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu al-mubīnu
translations: Allah will pay them in full
Allah will pay them in full
